name: Mythos Palace

reviews.title: more 3star than 5, avoid ALL- inclusive
reviews.text: I just stayed for five nights at this hotel, advertised as a 5star, but in Cretan standards. Being used to nice hotels, I imagined a five star hotel to offer me basic standards such as a good breakfast, here the breakfast was tastless, the orange juice was water with sirup ( in a country where orange come cheap), the all-inclusive deal is aweful, when you order a bellini, it comes with water. The room was basic, and you had to keep the window open ( which means no light in the room when closed) to havel light. Bath products were cheap, service was not good at all, there was a lack of staff ( same people at the bar and in the restaurant). The beach was good though, large and clean, as well as the swimming pool, but dont expect anything on this side of Creta, even though the East ( Elounda, Aghios Nikolaos) is much nicer and the St Nicolas Bay hotel really deserves its 5star rating.

description: Mythos Palace Resort & Spa is located in Kavros Georgioupolis Chania Crete, built in a extent of 30000 m2, from which the 20000 m2 are gardens and communal spaces. In this, particular natural beauties protected, region from the network "Natura 2000", the hotel allocates a private sandy beach that fills all the conditions of safety and in collaboration with the Company of Nature, has been rewarded with the Light blue Flag.Mythos Palace Resort & Spa offers a wonderful family atmosphere and combines the real Cretan Hospitality in an environment, based on modern but also traditional Cretan architecture. This hotel is ideal for carefree and peaceful holidays especially for families.
